items.title: Nazara acquires another 10.26% in subsidiary Absolute Sports for Rs 72.73 crore
items.description: Nazara has a share purchase agreement (SPA), dated September 18, 2024 with subsidiary Absolute Sports and founding shareholders Porush Jain and Srinivas Cuddapah for the acquisition of 19.35% stake.

items.title: Dixon Tech to make refrigerators and components with Cellecor Gadgets
items.description: Aside of Dixon Tech, Cellecor Gadgets recently signed a pact with EPACK Durable for home appliances. Dixon's Atul Lall said the collaboration enhances company's reach in the refrigerator segment.

items.title: VA Tech Wabag enters Zambian market with Rs 700 crore water treatment project, stock surges 4%
items.description: VA Tech's order marks the company's entry into Zambia, and order will be executed over 36 months. VA Tech Wabag said this is one of Zambia’s largest and most advanced sanitation projects in recent decades.

items.title: IndusInd Bank Quick Take: MFI loan auction, more pain in store?
items.description: While, prima facie, it appears a good move to lighten its bad assets’ burden it is not clear if all the pain has been addressed, given the relatively large microfinance loan book

items.title: 2024: A landmark year for green energy in India with record renewable addition and policy momentum
items.description: Between January and November this year, the country added at least 24 GW of renewable capacity, double that of 2023, crossing the 200 GW mark. However, industry estimates show that nearly 40 GW of green projects have no takers.
